---
title: "Name checklist for file, folder and spreadsheet headers"
author: "colomb_julien"
date: "11/27/2018"
output: pdf_document
---



```{r, echo=FALSE}
library (readr)
Checklist <- read_delim("Checklist_filenames.csv",";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE,
                        col_types =cols(
  `If the name of the file/folder/spreadsheet header:` = col_character(),
  `then modify it this way` = col_character()
)
)

B= ""
for ( i in c(1:nrow(Checklist))){
  B<- paste0 (B,"- ", Checklist[i,1] ," \n    - ", Checklist[i,2], " \n")
}

```

`r B`
